details: Built and maintained frontends for several projects as a solo JavaScript developer, focusing on clean UX and responsive design.
Developed two dashboards: one client-facing (insights, analytics) and one for internal operations (coordination, management).
Created a flexible chatbot SDK for easy integration into websites and apps, enhancing user interaction and support.
Worked closely with stakeholders to understand needs and deliver practical, reliable solutions.
Used modern JavaScript frameworks and tools to keep codebases fast, modular, and maintainable.
Improved features based on real user feedback and testing to refine usability and functionality.
Resolved bugs and technical issues to enhance system reliability.
Maintained and improved core projects, ensuring consistent performance.
Optimized application flow by identifying and eliminating bottlenecks.
Built and maintained client-side code to ensure functionality and smooth user experience.
Translated Figma designs into precise Angular components.
Improved front-end performance and accessibility by adhering to best practices.
Implemented dynamic forms for KYC workflows, streamlining data collection.
Wrote over 300 unit tests using Jest to ensure code reliability.
Contributed to Agile CI/CD workflows to support ongoing development and deployments.
Maintained and updated website content to ensure accuracy and relevance for a local delivery service.
Managed Linux packages and dependencies to optimize system performance.
Performed routine server maintenance and tuning to ensure stable operation.
